text: Torchy Millar (born 20 August 1945) is a Canadian equestrian. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics and the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Canada Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Canada Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Canada Category:Equestrians at the 1971 Pan American Games Category:Equestrians at the 1983 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Calgary
title: Torchy Millar
